-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A library to produce simple ciphers for use with lambdabot.
--   
--   To use MuCipher, first import Codec.MuCipher, then pick something to
--   say. Then use showCipher or printCipher to see how to hide the
--   message. After the message is ciphered, it can be deciphered by
--   running it any Haskell interpreter, like Hugs or lambdabot.
@package mucipher
@version 0.6.0

module Codec.MuCipher
encodeList :: Integer -> [Integer] -> Integer
decodeList :: Integer -> Integer -> [Integer]
getTable :: String -> String
getListWith :: String -> String -> [Integer]
getList :: String -> [Integer]
getIntegerWith :: String -> String -> Integer
getString :: String -> Integer -> String
showCipherString :: String -> String -> String -> String
showCipherWith :: String -> String -> String
showCipher :: String -> String
printCipher :: String -> IO ()
